content: jacqueline cieslak 1 details lace panel c size chart finished measurements 12 /30 5cm by 12 /30 5cm begin at the first row on the bottom and work your way up when you reach the end of row 12 return note it is very easy to make this washcloth larger to row 1 or smaller by changing the number of sts you cast on feel free to modify according to your gauge/ because the washcloth is worked flat you will size preference work the ws row odd numbers from left to right and the rs row even numbers from right to left yarn requirements key this washcloth is designed for a fingering weight linen/cotton blend i used ritual dyes undine 382 yds/100 g k on rs p on ws yards 100 p on rs k on ws meters 92 k tbl on rs p tbl on ws yarn over gauge needles notions ssk on rs ssp on ws k2tog on rs p2tog on ws gauge 22 sts and 28 row over 4 /10cm in stockinette after blocking 12 recommended needles us 3 3 25 mm 32 /80 11 cm circular needle 10 9 notions stitch markers at least 4 darning needle 8 7 6 5 directions 4 3 2 1 cast on using a long-tail cast on or preferred method cast on 66 sts written setup row ws k2 pm work the first row of lace panel c over 9 sts pm k2 pm p to 7 sts before end row 1 ws p1 tbl k1 p2 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl pm k2 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl k2 row 2 rs k1 tbl p1 yo k1 tbl p1 ssk k1 p1 k1 tbl row 1 rs p2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p2 sm k to m sm row 3 p1 tbl k1 ssp k1 p1 tbl yo p1 k1 p1 tbl p2 sm work the next row of lace panel c over 9 sts row 4 k1 tbl p1 k2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl sm p2 row 5 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl p2 k1 p1 tbl row 2 k2 sm work the next row of lace panel c row 6 k1 tbl p1 k2 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl over 9 sts sm k2 sm p to m sm k2 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl row 7 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl p2 k1 p1 tbl k2 row 8 k1 tbl p1 k1 k2tog p1 k1 tbl yo p1 k1 tbl cont repeat row 1-2 until washcloth is as long as it is row 9 p1 tbl k1 p1 yo p1 tbl k1 p2tog k1 p1 tbl wide or until desired length row 10 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl k2 p1 k1 tbl break yarn bind off knitwise weave in ends and row 11 p1 tbl k1 p2 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl k1 p1 tbl wet
